dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-tldextract
dependent_to.description:
Accurately separates a URL's subdomain, domain, and public suffix,
using the Public Suffix List (PSL). By default, this includes the public
ICANN TLDs and their exceptions. You can optionally support the Public
Suffix List's private domains as well.

dependent_to.name: py-hyperlink
dependent_to.description: A featureful, immutable, and correct URL for Python.

dependent_to.description: Core (offline) functionality for the apeye library.

dependent_to.description: A Client of HIVdb Sierra GraphQL Webservice

dependent_to.name: py-rfc3986
dependent_to.description:
A Python implementation of RFC 3986 including validation and authority
parsing.

dependent_to.name: py-yarl
dependent_to.description: The module provides handy URL class for URL parsing and changing.

dependent_to.name: py-email-validator
dependent_to.description: A robust email address syntax and deliverability validation library.

dependent_to.name: py-anyio
dependent_to.description:
High level compatibility layer for multiple asynchronous event loop
implementations.

dependent_to.name: py-urllib3
dependent_to.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependent_to.name: py-httpx
dependent_to.description:
HTTPX is a fully featured HTTP client for Python 3, which provides sync
and async APIs, and support for both HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2.
